news.label: Newcomer
news.text: Claudie Gauvreau joins the group for a Master's degree. She'll do associative TMS combine with fMRI studies.

news.label: Newcomer
news.text: Sukhmanjit Ghumman joins the group for a Master's degree. He'll try to understand the effect of the cerebral tumor on the brain network.

news.label: Conference
news.text: Michael Bernier, Russell Butler, Maxime Chamberland, Gabriel Girard and David Provencher went to OHBM in Hawaii.

news.text: Michael Bernier, Maxime Chamberland, Gabriel Girard, Vincent MÃ©thot and David Provencher went to ISMRM in Toronto.

news.label: Update
news.text: This website is now hosted with github webpages.

news.label: Newcomer
news.text: Alexandre Bizeau joins the group for a Master's degree. He'll work on human brain vascular segmentation.

news.label: Newcomer
news.text: Russell Butler joins the group for a Master's degree.
